title: Layered straws
description: The secret of delicious puff pastries lies in the simplicity of their preparation.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Place two sheets of dough on your work surface.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Using a knife, cut the dough into long strips.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut out triangles from parchment paper.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Roll each paper triangle into a cone.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Take a cone and one strip of dough.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Line a baking sheet with parchment or grease it with oil.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Preheat the oven to 180°C.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Using a pastry brush, brush the surface of the dough with egg.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: While the tubes are baking, pour water into the saucepan and add sugar to it.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Place the saucepan over low heat and gently heat the mixture for a few minutes, stirring constantly.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Break the remaining eggs.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Beat the whites with a mixer.

steps.title: STEP 13
steps.description: Add sugar syrup from the saucepan to the whites.

steps.title: STEP 14
steps.description: Transfer the resulting cream into a pastry bag.

steps.title: STEP 15
steps.description: Remove the paper cones from the prepared tubes.

title: Bananas in Greek yogurt
description: Make a simple and healthy dessert using bananas and yogurt.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and wipe the banana, peel it and cut off the ends.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the banana into slices about 4-5 mm thick.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place each banana slice into the yogurt one at a time.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place the banana slices in the yogurt on a tray lined with parchment paper.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Serve bananas in yogurt with fresh berries and any drink of your choice.

title: Yeast donuts
description: Round yeast donuts are similar to Berliners and can be made with jam, condensed milk or other filling.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Remove the butter from the refrigerator and let it soften in the warmth.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Pour the milk into a microwave-safe container.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Pour the milk into a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Set aside 0.5 tbsp.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Knead with your hands for 10 minutes to form a soft, light but elastic dough.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Sprinkle the table with 0.5 tbsp.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place the dough balls on the table at a distance from each other.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Pour oil into a deep saucepan.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Place the finished donuts on a plate lined with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Dip the donuts in powdered sugar and serve with a cup of cocoa.

title: Vegan chocolate avocado mousse
description: Not only does avocado have a neutral flavor, but it also has a smooth, creamy texture.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the avocado, cut it in half and remove the pit.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the avocado pulp into a blender bowl.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Pour cocoa powder into a blender bowl, add coconut milk and maple syrup.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add vanilla and sea salt to the remaining ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Decorate the chocolate mousse with fresh strawberries and powdered sugar.

title: Kurabye on curd dough
description: The usual kurabye can be made healthier and more varied if you use cottage cheese dough as a basis.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Sift the flour.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Thoroughly mash the cottage cheese with sugar, salt, egg and vanilla with a fork.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Warm the milk slightly to 40°.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add yeast and flour to the curd mixture.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Knead a homogeneous thick dough, knead it thoroughly for 5 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Punch down the dough and divide it into 6 equal parts.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place a little jam in the center of each cake.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Transfer the preparations to a baking sheet.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Serve curd kurabye with tea, fresh raspberries, blackberries and sprinkle with powdered sugar.

title: Sponge roll with jam
description: Making sponge roll doesn't require much effort.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the chicken eggs.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Break the eggs.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Add half the sugar and vanilla to the yolks.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pour water into the yolks.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add the remaining sugar and a little salt to the whites.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Fold the beaten whites into the egg mixture.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour flour and baking powder into the resulting mass.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Pour the finished dough onto the baking sheet and smooth it with a spatula so that the edges are the same thickness as the center.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Take out the finished biscuit.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: When the roll has cooled, carefully unroll it and brush with jam.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Place the finished roll on a serving plate.

title: Granola at home
description: Baked oatmeal with nuts and dried fruits, known as granola, makes a tasty but dietary breakfast or nutritious snack.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Prepare two bowls, a container with an airtight lid, and a baking sheet.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Coarsely chop the almonds and place them in one of the bowls.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Pour maple syrup into a second bowl and add coconut oil.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pour the dry ingredients into the liquid ingredients and mix everything until smooth.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Spread the mixture in a baking dish into a thin layer and place in the oven for 20 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Stir the granola again and let it bake for another 20 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Remove the finished granola from the oven and let it cool completely to room temperature.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve homemade granola with Greek yogurt and strawberries.

title: Chia pudding with kefir
description: With just two ingredients you can prepare an incredibly healthy and delicious breakfast or afternoon snack.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Measure out the required amount of all ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Pour the kefir into a bowl or container.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Add chia seeds.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add sugar.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Cover the bowl with a lid or cling film.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Cut bananas and kiwi into small slices, cut strawberries in half.

title: Lapshevnik casserole with apple jam
description: Lapshevnik is very convenient to prepare from the noodles left over after lunch or dinner, but you can also specially cook it for this delicious pie.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the chicken egg.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cook the egg noodles in boiling salted water for 5 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place cottage cheese in a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Separate the yolk from the white.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: In one bowl, combine cottage cheese, noodles, jam, yolk and vanillin.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Grease a baking dish with butter and sprinkle with breadcrumbs.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Let the noodle maker cool slightly and cut into portions.

title: Brownies in the microwave in 15 minutes
description: The world-famous brownie cake is popular not only because of its bright chocolate taste and interesting texture, but also because of its ease of preparation.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Sift the flour.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the butter in a saucepan, place over medium heat and melt the butter completely until liquid.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Add cocoa powder to the butter and sugar, stir everything again until smooth.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Break an egg into a bowl and whisk all ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and level it with a spoon.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Decorate the brownies with walnuts and serve the dessert with a cup of black coffee.

title: Pate with sprats and beans
description: Sprats are quite easy to turn into pate by simply crushing them with a fork.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the garlic.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the egg in a saucepan and fill it with water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Pour very cold water over the egg in a saucepan and leave for 10-15 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place canned red beans in blender jar.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add a clove of garlic to the beans and grind everything in a blender until smooth.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Cut the boiled and peeled egg into 4 parts, place in the blender bowl with the already crushed ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Grind the egg and sprats in a blender until they are completely mixed with the beans and garlic.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Place the curd cheese into the pate and beat everything again until completely homogeneous.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Transfer the finished pate into a jar and close it with a lid.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Spread the bean pate onto pieces of rye bread.

title: Potato curry croquettes
description: Curry seasoning perfectly complements any dish.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the potatoes and onions.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the potatoes into small cubes and place in a saucepan with water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the finished potatoes in a bowl and mash with a potato masher until smooth.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the onion into small cubes and place in a frying pan along with 1 tbsp.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add fried onions to mashed potatoes.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Cut the cheese into cubes.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place the chicken egg, flour and breadcrumbs on three different plates.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Dredge the croquettes one at a time, first in flour and then in egg and breadcrumbs.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Heat a saucepan with vegetable oil.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Place the curry croquettes on a plate.

title: Spring rolls with mango and shrimp in lettuce leaves
description: Make fresh and crispy spring rolls with sweet mango, spicy chilli and fragrant shrimp.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the lime, mint, mango and lettuce.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Finely chop the chili pepper.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Squeeze the juice from half the lime.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the mango pulp into strips and place in a bowl with the dressing.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Pour rapeseed oil into a frying pan and heat it over high heat.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the shrimp in the sauce with daikon and mango, stir well and leave to soak in the seasonings for 5 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place the lettuce leaves on a plate and evenly distribute the shrimp, daikon and mango mixture over them.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Wrap the filling in leaves.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Serve Vietnamese spring rolls with peanut sauce.

title: Beet chips
description: Beetroot chips are prepared in the same way as potato chips.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the beets well.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the beets into very thin slices.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a deep frying pan or deep fryer.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Fry the beet chips in small batches for 3-5 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Place beets on a wire rack or paper towels to drain and absorb excess oil.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Sprinkle the chips with coarse sea salt before serving.

title: Lavash roll
description: The good thing about a lavash roll is that you can put any filling you like in it.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the cucumber.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Boil the chicken fillet.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the cucumber into cubes.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Grate the cheese on a medium grater.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Spread lavash on the table.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Distribute a mixture of cucumbers with cheese, carrots and mayonnaise over the salad.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Cut the pita roll into portions.

title: Homemade herring
description: There are two secrets, knowing which you can easily prepare delicious herring - moderately salty, juicy and dense.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Thaw the herring.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Rinse with water and dry the defrosted herring.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Make the brine.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add allspice, cloves, bay leaves and peppercorns.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Stir and bring the marinade to a boil over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the herring in a pickling container.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour in the brine so that the fish is completely immersed in it.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the herring in a pickling container.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour in the brine so that the fish is completely immersed in it.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Place the prepared herring from the brine.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Place pieces of lightly salted herring on a plate.

title: Carrot pkhali
description: For this pkhali recipe, we chose raw carrots, but you can use boiled or baked ones.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the carrots.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Grate the cheese and carrots separately on a fine grater.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Chop the pistachios into smaller pieces with a knife or blender.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Mix cheese, carrots, dill, black pepper, coriander, salt and one spoon of mayonnaise in a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Form small balls from the resulting mixture and roll them in pistachios.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Serve carrot pkhali on lettuce leaves.

title: Baked Sweet Potato Chips
description: The color of sweet potatoes is similar to carrots, and the taste resembles potatoes and pumpkin at the same time.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the sweet potatoes.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the sweet potato into thin slices using a special grater, vegetable peeler or knife.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Drizzle the sweet potato with vegetable oil and toss well so that each slice is coated on both sides with oil.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place sweet potato slices in a single layer on a baking sheet.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Salt the sweet potatoes.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Serve the chips with garlic or any other sauce of your choice.

title: Chicken liver pate with cream
description: Prepare a delicious creamy pate.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Rinse the chicken livers thoroughly and dry them with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the chicken liver in a saucepan and fill it with water so that it covers the offal by about 2-3 cm.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the pan over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Chop the onion into thin half rings.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Puree the boiled chicken liver in a blender.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Add the fried vegetables to the blender with the liver.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Grind the ingredients until smooth.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Cut the toast bread diagonally in two and serve with the chicken pate.

title: Egg in bread in a frying pan
description: For this recipe, it is advisable to take a large and thick piece of bread so that the egg does not spread during cooking and there is enough space for the white.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the chicken egg.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Use a cookie cutter, glass, or knife to cut a heart- or circle-shaped hole in a slice of bread.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Using a spatula, carefully turn the bread and egg over to the other side so that the yolk is sealed inside.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Salt and pepper the egg.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Before serving, sprinkle the bread and egg with grated cheese.

title: Bean salad with walnuts
description: A very satisfying but simple salad of canned beans with walnuts and smoked chicken breast is ready in just 15 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Remove the smoked chicken breast from the packaging and separate the fillet from the skin and bones.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the canned beans in a colander and allow the liquid to drain.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the smoked chicken fillet into thin strips.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pass a clove of garlic through a press.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Finely chop fresh cilantro.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Cut the walnuts into small pieces.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Combine beans, smoked chicken breast, walnuts, garlic and cilantro in a salad bowl.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Salt and pepper the collected ingredients and mix.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Season the salad with mayonnaise, stir well.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Serve bean and walnut salad with rye bread.

title: Salad with cabbage, apple and orange
description: To prepare a light low-calorie salad you need only three ingredients: white cabbage, apple and orange.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Rinse and dry cabbage and fruit thoroughly.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Chop the cabbage into thin strips.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the orange into small slices.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the apple into slices or cubes.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add fruit to the salad bowl with cabbage.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: In a separate bowl, mix vinegar and oil.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour the prepared dressing over the salad.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve cabbage and apple salad as an appetizer to your main course.

title: Wreath with radishes and fennel
description: The sweetness of fennel pairs well with smoked fish, and the lime juice brings out the flavor of both ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and wipe the limes, avocados, cucumbers, shallots and radishes.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Squeeze the juice from the lime.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Chop the onion feathers and fill them with cold water.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place the avocado pulp in a clean bowl and mash it into a puree.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Cut the cucumbers lengthwise into thin long strips.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the avocado mixture in a circle on a serving plate.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Drain the fennel juice from the bowl and spread evenly over the onions.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Add radish slices and salmon cubes to the “wreath”.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Decorate the wreath with drops of sour cream, spread a little red caviar on them.

title: Light non-crab salad
description: Crab salad can be prepared without crab sticks.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the pollock fillet.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the pollock fillet into pieces and boil in boiling water for 7 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cook rice in boiling water according to instructions.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place the egg yolks in a small bowl.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Pour olive oil into the mixture in a stream and stir.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add salt, pepper and lemon juice to the mixture.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Cut the finished fish into small pieces and place in a salad bowl.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Boil the eggs for 7-8 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Cut the cucumber into cubes and place in a bowl with the rest of the ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Add boiled corn and rice to the salad.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Season the dish with prepared mayonnaise and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Place the prepared salad in portions through the cooking ring.

title: Warm chickpea and roasted vegetable salad
description: Chickpea salad is perfect for a hearty dinner.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash vegetables and herbs, dry with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the vegetables into small strips.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Transfer the vegetables to a bowl and toss them with the olive oil.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Preheat oven to 200°C.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Place the prepared vegetables in a deep bowl.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Finely chop the greens.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Before serving, sprinkle the warm chickpea and roasted vegetable salad with sesame seeds.

title: Japanese salad with daikon
description: Japanese daikon radish has two ripening seasons.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and clean the daikon, cut off the bottom part.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Grind the daikon using a coarse or Korean grater.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Add mung bean sprouts to the chopped daikon and mix gently.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the nori sheet into thin strips about 2-3 cm long and distribute them on the surface of the salad.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Grind the sesame seeds in a mortar or wooden masher and pour them into a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add sugar, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil and mayonnaise to the sesame seeds.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour the resulting dressing over the salad and serve it.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve the daikon salad as an accompaniment to another hot dish.

title: Carrot and apple salad with honey
description: Even if you just mix grated carrots with honey, you will get a delicious, vitamin-rich and not too high-calorie salad that can serve as a dessert.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the carrots.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the apple into thin long slices.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Add honey to carrots and apples.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pour the yoghurt over the salad and stir everything thoroughly again.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Garnish carrots with honey when serving with light raisins.

title: Swedish beet salad
description: This beet salad is partly inspired by Russian vinaigrette, and partly follows the Scandinavian custom of eating beets pickled and pairing them with other savory foods.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the parsley and apple.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the pickled beets in a colander.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the apple, pickled cucumber and onion into cubes with a side of 6-7 mm.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: When the marinade has drained from the beets, transfer them to a salad bowl.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Finely chop the parsley and add it to the chopped vegetables and apple.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Season the salad with sour cream, add 1-1.5 tbsp.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Serve Swedish beet salad with rye bread.

title: Red cabbage and beet salad
description: Among other appetizers, this salad stands out with its bright red color, which comes from beets.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry all vegetables with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Finely chop the cabbage.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the onion into thin half rings.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place the chopped vegetables in a deep container and mix thoroughly.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Pour water into the pan.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the pan over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Pour the hot marinade over the vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: After the marinade has cooled, cover the salad with film and refrigerate for 2 days.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Place the resulting salad on a plate.

title: Warm chicken liver and pear salad
description: Soft chicken livers go great with crispy fresh pears.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Thaw the liver, remove the films, rinse it and dry it.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the liver in a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Peel the pears and remove the cores.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Place the finished liver on a plate, and place pear slices on the same plate.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Serve the chicken liver with pear, garnishing the plate with orange slices.

title: Green Lentil Soup
description: Unlike any other lentils, green lentils do not need to be pre-soaked in water, which makes cooking much easier.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Rinse the lentils under running water several times.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the lentils in a saucepan and cover with plenty of water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the pan over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the potatoes into arbitrary pieces.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: 10 minutes after the lentils boil, add the potatoes to the pan.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Grate the carrots.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place the pan on the stove and wait until it is completely hot.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Cut the tomatoes and zucchini into small cubes.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: When the potatoes are ready, add tomatoes and zucchini to the soup.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: When the soup boils, add the roasted vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Cut the leeks into thin rings.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Add the leeks to the soup and add a little more salt if necessary.

steps.title: STEP 13
steps.description: Ladle the green lentil soup into bowls.

title: Soup with potatoes and melted cheese
description: Meat is rarely added to cheese soups, and carrots, cabbage or celery are usually taken from vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the potatoes into small cubes.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Transfer the chopped potatoes to the pan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Melt butter in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: When the potatoes are ready, add the frying.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Pour the cheese soup into deep bowls.

title: Detox broccoli and zucchini soup
description: This soup is great to make after the holidays.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and wipe the vegetables and ginger.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Heat a pan with olive oil over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the onion in the pan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the zucchini into arbitrary pieces.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add the vegetables to the pan along with the water.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Season the soup with salt and pepper and bring it to a boil.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Finely chop the garlic and ginger.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Wait for the soup to cool.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Pour the detox soup into deep bowls.

title: Homemade pike perch soup
description: Classic fish soup is usually prepared from a minimal set of ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the pike perch.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut off the head and tail of the fish.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the pan on the fire and bring the contents to a boil.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: When the broth boils, reduce the heat to low.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Wait for the broth to boil again.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Remove vegetables, herbs and fish parts from the pan.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Cut the potatoes into small cubes and add to the boiling broth along with a few pinches of salt.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Cut the remaining carrots into semicircular slices.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Cut the pike perch into several equal pieces.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Finely chop the parsley leaves.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Pour the pike perch soup into plates.

title: Rice soup with chicken
description: Classic chicken soup with rice and potatoes is prepared from the simplest and most affordable ingredients that you usually have on hand.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the chicken thigh.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the chicken thigh in a saucepan and fill it with prepared water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the potatoes into cubes with a side of about 1 cm. Chop the onion into thin quarter rings.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Remove the finished chicken from the broth, separate the meat from the skin and bones, and cut it into small pieces.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Wait until the broth boils, put the potatoes and rice into it.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Heat a frying pan over high heat and pour sunflower oil into it.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Transfer the fried onions and carrots to the soup.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Pour rice soup with chicken into deep serving bowls and top it with wheat croutons.

title: Uzbek soup “Mastava”
description: The thick and very nourishing Uzbek soup “Mastava” is often called liquid pilaf.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the beef.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the washed rice in a saucepan and add 1 cup of water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the beef and potatoes into thin slices.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place a cauldron over high heat and pour sunflower oil into it.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Chop the carrots and place them in the cauldron, heat them together with the onions and meat for 3-4 minutes, stirring.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Boil 1.4 liters of water in a kettle and pour it into the cauldron.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Wait for the water to boil in the cauldron and place the potatoes in the soup.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Form the ground beef into meatballs about 2cm in diameter.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Season the soup with garlic, bay leaf, salt, and black pepper.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Add chopped cilantro and parsley to the soup, boiled rice and heat everything together for another 1-2 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Sprinkle the finished soup with sesame seeds and serve.

title: Miso soup with tofu and shiitake mushrooms
description: The most important ingredients in this soup are miso paste and hondashi fish broth.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the mushrooms and green onions.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the tofu cheese into cubes 2-2.5 cm wide.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Dissolve the Hondashi fish broth in 4 cups boiling water in a small saucepan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pour 2-3 tablespoons of broth into a small bowl.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Finely chop the green onions.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Serve a small portion of boiled rice along with a bowl of miso soup.

title: Thick winter soup
description: For a thick winter soup you will need chicken, rice and various root vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Thaw, wash and dry the chicken.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Finely chop the onions, carrots and celery.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a saucepan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add carrots, celery and pumpkin.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Pass the garlic through a press.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Trim the meat from the chicken thighs and chop finely.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Finely chop the parsley.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve the soup with croutons.

title: Chicken and noodle soup
description: Simple and beloved by many since childhood, chicken noodle soup can be prepared at any time of the year.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: If you have frozen meat, defrost it first.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the chicken leg in a saucepan and cover with water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Meanwhile, cut the potatoes into small pieces.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Remove the chicken from the broth.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Place the potatoes into the boiling broth.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add carrots, chicken and vermicelli to the soup.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Add parsley to the soup.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve the soup with a hard-boiled chicken egg, cut in half.

title: Homemade cabbage soup
description: Thick, rich homemade cabbage soup does not cook quickly.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Thaw, wash and dry a piece of beef.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place a piece of beef in a saucepan and cover with cold water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the onions and carrots in half.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Finely chop the cabbage.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add cinnamon and ground black pepper to the onion and mix well.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place carrots and celery in the pan.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Remove the meat from the broth, separate it from the bone and chop it finely.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Place cabbage and meat in the pan.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Place the roasted vegetables into the pan.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Lastly, add the bay leaf and dried basil.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Serve cabbage soup with sour cream.

title: Homemade chicken
description: For aromatic home-style chicken, you only need chicken fillet, mayonnaise, seasonings and any vegetables you can find at home.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Rinse and dry the chicken and tomato with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the chicken fillet into slices 2-3 cm in size. Pass the garlic through a press or chop it on a grater.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the chicken slices and garlic in a bowl and stir to combine.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add mayonnaise to the chicken with garlic, add salt, pepper and a mixture of Provencal herbs.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Cut the onions and bell peppers into large half rings.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Remove the stem attachment point from the tomato.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Place the onion half rings evenly on the bottom of the baking dish.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Distribute the pieces of marinated chicken fillet over the onion, laying them out in an even layer at a short distance from each other.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: After the time has passed, remove the pan with the half-cooked chicken from the oven.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Sprinkle the chicken with homemade grated Parmesan and serve with roasted potatoes.

title: Oatmeal cutlets
description: Lenten oatmeal cutlets don't have to be tasteless and bland.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the potatoes and onions.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place oatmeal in a bowl and cover with hot water.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Chop the onion very finely.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Grind the potatoes using a fine-hole grater.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add onions and potatoes to steamed oatmeal.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Mix all the ingredients quickly so that the potatoes do not have time to darken.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Salt and pepper the cutlet mixture, stir everything thoroughly again.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Cover the cutlet mixture with cling film and let it stand for about 10 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Pour oil into a frying pan and heat it over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Using a tablespoon, place the oat mixture into the pan in the form of oblong cutlets.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Flip the cutlets and fry them on the other side for another 3-4 minutes until golden brown.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Place the finished oatmeal cutlets on a plate lined with paper napkins.

steps.title: STEP 13
steps.description: Cover oatmeal cutlets with microgreens and serve with sour cream and asparagus.

title: Juicy meat cutlets
description: To prepare delicious cutlets, it is important to choose the right meat.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the meat.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the crust off the bread.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Cut the meat into small pieces and pass through a meat grinder.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Add bread soaked in water to the minced meat.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Beat the egg into the ingredients and add spices to taste.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Take some minced meat and form it into a cutlet.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Heat a frying pan with oil.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Serve the cutlets with mashed potatoes or any other side dish of your choice.

title: Dumplings in sour cream
description: Fried dumplings will become even tastier if you add a little sour cream and grated cheese to them, and then bake them in the oven.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Rinse and peel the garlic cloves.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place a frying pan with half the oil over moderate heat.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place the dumplings in the pan and, stirring, fry them on all sides until golden brown.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Grease the baking dish with the remaining oil.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Mix sour cream and tomato sauce in a small bowl.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Pour the prepared sauce over the dumplings.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Transfer the finished dumplings in sour cream to a plate and serve them hot.

title: Potato gnocchi
description: In Italian cuisine, as in any other, you can find simple dishes that are well suited for dinner.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the potatoes thoroughly and dry them with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place the potatoes in a deep saucepan.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Drain the water from the pan.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Place the potatoes back into the pan and mash thoroughly with a special potato masher or a regular fork.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Finely chop a bunch of greens.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add the greens to the potatoes and stir well so that they are evenly distributed throughout the mashed potatoes.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Divide the finished dough into several equal parts.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Roll each part into a rope approximately 2 cm thick.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Using a sharp knife, cut the ropes into small pieces.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Fill the pan with water.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: When the water boils, place the potato gnocchi in it.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Place potato gnocchi on a large plate.

title: Onion cutlets
description: If you've ever added onions to potato pancakes, you probably remember this appetizing smell of almost pureed and fried vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and peel the onions.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Cut the onions into 5-6 parts, pass them through a meat grinder or grind them in a blender.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Finely chop the dill and add it to the onion.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Break the egg into a bowl with the onion and dill.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add salt, black pepper and flour to the onion mixture.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the pan over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Turn the cutlets over and fry them on the other side for another 3-4 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Place cooked cutlets on a serving platter lined with paper towels.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Serve warm onion cutlets with sour cream and microgreens.

title: Semolina cutlets
description: Even the most delicious semolina porridge for breakfast can get boring, but this is not a reason to refuse semolina dishes.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash the egg and dry with a paper towel.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Pour milk into a saucepan and place it over medium heat.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Pour semolina into boiling milk and stir well.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Reduce heat to low.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Transfer the cooled porridge to a bowl.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Break an egg into a bowl of porridge.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Add flour to the porridge with egg, leaving a little for forming cutlets.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Pour the breadcrumbs onto a flat plate and spread them over the plate in an even layer.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Wet your hands with cool water, shape the semolina mixture into round, flat cutlets about 5 cm in diameter and roll in the remaining flour.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Roll the resulting cutlets in breadcrumbs and place them on a board or tray.

steps.title: STEP 11
steps.description: Place the frying pan over high heat, pour sunflower oil into it and heat well.

steps.title: STEP 12
steps.description: Slightly reduce the heat under the frying pan and place the cutlet blanks, breaded in breadcrumbs, into the hot oil.

steps.title: STEP 13
steps.description: Fry semolina cutlets on one side for 4-5 minutes until thick golden brown.

title: Whole wheat pancakes
description: Whole grain flour from unrefined wheat retains vitamins and fiber from the grain shell, which is destroyed during normal grinding.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the egg, sift the flour.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Pour kefir and water into a microwave-safe container and heat for 30 seconds until warm.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Break the egg into a bowl, add salt, sugar and soda.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Pour warm kefir and water into the bowl of the egg mixture, stir the mixture again with a whisk.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Add the sifted flour to the bowl with the liquid ingredients.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Place the frying pan over high heat and grease it with sunflower oil.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Fry the pancake for 1-2 minutes until the top is set.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Place the finished pancake on a serving plate.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Serve ready-made whole grain pancakes with jam or any other sauce of your choice.

title: Stew with chicken, beans and vegetables
description: Stew is a very satisfying and nutrient-rich dish.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the chicken.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Finely chop the onion.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Fry the onion and garlic in a frying pan with oil for 1-2 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Cut the chicken fillet into cubes and add to the pan with the vegetables.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Chop the remaining vegetables and add to the pan.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Add beans to vegetables with chicken.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Add enough water to lightly cover the stew.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Transfer the chicken and bean stew to a plate.

title: Chicken liver goulash
description: Traditionally, goulash is made from beef or veal, but we decided to replace them with chicken liver.

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.description: Wash and dry the chicken liver.

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.description: Place a saucepan of water over medium heat and bring to a boil.

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.description: Place green beans in boiling water and boil for 5 minutes.

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.description: Make cross-shaped cuts on the top of the tomatoes and peel them.

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.description: Place flour on a plate.

steps.title: STEP 6
steps.description: Heat a frying pan with butter.

steps.title: STEP 7
steps.description: Chop the onions and garlic cloves.

steps.title: STEP 8
steps.description: Add green beans, liver and chopped tomatoes to the pan.

steps.title: STEP 9
steps.description: Pour water into the pan.

steps.title: STEP 10
steps.description: Serve chicken liver goulash with any side dish of your choice.
